home.topSceneHeader:
I don't believe
in empty slogans
so won't be any inhere
– only the specifics

qualities.teamplayer: ...and I became a programmer not to talk to people :)

about.text:
My name is Konrad, I live in the beautiful city of Gdansk, Poland. I'm a front-end developer.

Why did I choose the front? Going back to my first fascinations with the digital universe, I was always interested in the combination of technology and art. The front-end development allows me to combine both of these aspects through programming and working with graphics.

Apart from my professional interests, I have several other hobbies. Overall, I love creating SOMETHING out of nothing. Plastic kit modelling, jewellery making, and drawing with pencils, crayons, and ink, are my favourite ways to express myself. Besides, I enjoy playing the guitar, fishing with a rod and travelling.

If you want to know some more – please check out my CV.

pzu.title: PZU Cash
pzu.description:
Internet system for allocating cash loans to employees from the social fund with the possibility of generating loans in real-time:
• landing page with a loan calculator (HTML/JS)
• system for processing the application (Angular/RxJS/NgRx)
• customer panel (Angular/RxJS)
• backoffice (Angular/RxJS)
